name: Tiny Hungry Shark
description:
This game was created for our First Game Jam: Winter 2023 by Bawk n' Bite, a group of software development students in our final year of university who are passionate about creating fun and unique games. Our goal is to bring joy and excitement to players everywhere through our creative and innovative game designs.
